Title: Requires the workers' compensation board to submit a supplemental report every year
Summary: Requires the workers' compensation board to submit a supplemental report every year, including recommendations to modernize such board and certain data regarding claims made and decisions rendered on such claims.
LawCode: Add ยง153-a, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to requiring the workers' compensation board to submit a supplemental report every year thereafter
